trends: There have been 148 other sightings in San Antonio
There was one other sighting in San Antonio on or around September 17th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was around 8:45ish, i was taking out the trash, and its nighttime so i dont know i just decided to look in the sky, and i noticed a pretty bright light that wasnt moving, and thats what actually got my attention, so i began to observe and eventually it started to move in circular paths at high speeds, now i was hooked, so i ran inside to call my mom, and even she was convinced. We were especially in aww when it when down really fast. I ran to get the camera, which by the way was dead -___-. And when i came back it was gone. I was shaking and had chhills because i couldnt believe what i was seeing even though it wasnt like massive.
Summary: It was stationary at first, then started moving in cirlurlar directions, and fast speeds going down.
